channel.title: Fixing Some Items Help
channel.description:
How can I fix: Torags Helm, Enchanted Robe Top, Infinity Robe Top?
Change selling price of PHats at my npc's store?
Err.. I think that is all.
Or if you can't help me link me to a tutorial?
Torags Helm - Hair replaces top of helm and side, excluding the horns.
Enchanted Robe and Infinity Robe Tops - See the green arms :S

item.title: Fixing Some Items Help
item.dc:creator: @wagahuh wagahuh
item.description:
@wagahuh wrote:

wow thats an obvious thing now.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Some Items Help
item.dc:creator: @jmull jmull
item.description:
@jmull wrote:

You can change the amount of the item and the items in the sotre using “shops.cfg,” not sure about the price
and you should really specify what’s wrong with the items.

Read full topic
